meanings.meaning: assassinate him to avenge one's country

vlive.korean: 만원 갚기. - 알겠습니다. Pay back 10,000 won. - Okay. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 연습도 실전처럼🎳
그래 그래, 갚기! 언니한테 만원 주면 돼. Sure, sure. Pay me back. You can give me 10,000 won. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 연습도 실전처럼🎳
vlive.english: Sure, sure. Pay me back. You can give me 10,000 won.

vlive.korean: [이 프로젝트로... 빚 갚기를... ] 파이팅! [Pay back the debt... with this project...] Fighting! 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : [빅픽처 in 베트남] 위험한 한탕(?)이 시작된다!
vlive.english: [Pay back the debt... with this project...] Fighting!

vlive.korean: 진 사람이... - 이거 돈 내기? 언니한테 돈 갚기? The lose has to... - Pay for this? Pay you back? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 연습도 실전처럼🎳
vlive.english: The lose has to... - Pay for this? Pay you back?

vlive.korean: 근데 또... - 은혜를 원수로 갚기... But... - We repaid them by being enemies... 듣기 View video HIGHLIGHT : 해피두준데이 다시 시작!
vlive.english: But... - We repaid them by being enemies...

examples.korean: Did he ever pay you back that $100 he owes you? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 네게 빌린 그 100달러를 갚기나 했니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Did he ever pay you back that $100 he owes you? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The gamblers vowed to revenge their boss. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 도박꾼들은 두목의 원수를 갚기로 맹세했다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The gamblers vowed to revenge their boss. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They want us to pay all current liabilities. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 우리가 유동부채를 전부 갚기를 원한다. Neungyule
examples.english: They want us to pay all current liabilities. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The loan was supposed to be repaid within 90 days. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대부금은 90일 이내에 갚기로 되어 있었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The loan was supposed to be repaid within 90 days. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Many do so because they are in a hurry to make a living and need to pay off bills. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대다수가 생계를 꾸리고 대금을 갚기 위해 이렇게 서둘러 창업한다. Neungyule
examples.english: Many do so because they are in a hurry to make a living and need to pay off bills. Add to Wordbook
